There is a small 5% dev fee in order to pay for marketing costs and developing the Lucky Cats ecosystem.

q: When is the best time to buy cats?
a: Always! No matter when you hire miners, you will begin with a return rate of 8% daily.
WE recommend that you compound at least once per day but you are free to do so as often as you wish.

Cats are sustained by continued community support, just as every other crypto coin, token or project. The difference is that since there is no token, there is no price to dump. As long as cats are mining in the contract, there will be rewards!
